pages.title: Autonomous Crafting
pages.text: The $(bold)craft_item$() tool is fully autonomous. It handles the entire chain from nothing:$(br2)$(li)Checks companion inventory + nearby chests$(li)Auto-crafts all intermediate items$(li)Auto-gathers missing raw materials$(li)Auto-crafts required tools first$(li)Auto-hunts mobs for drops (leather, string)$(li)Auto-smelts ores at a furnace$(br2)Example: $(thing)"Craft an iron pickaxe"$() from nothing — chop trees → craft planks → craft sticks → craft wood pick → gather stone → craft stone pick → mine iron → smelt → craft iron pickaxe.

pages.title: Smart Material Hints
pages.text: When materials are missing, the companion gives specific advice:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Diamonds, emeralds, lapis$() → $(thing)mine_ores$()$(li)$(bold)Iron, gold, copper$() → $(thing)mine_ores$() then smelt$(li)$(bold)Wood, sticks, planks$() → $(thing)chop_trees$()$(li)$(bold)Other blocks$() → $(thing)gather_blocks$()$(br2)The system also shows $(bold)difficulty warnings$() for dangerous ingredients — color-coded from $(#FFFF55)WARNING$() to $(#FF5555)IMPOSSIBLE$().

pages.title: Loop Safety
pages.text: The AI agent has built-in safety to prevent infinite retries:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Recursion guard$() — blocks re-attempting the same craft within 60 seconds$(li)$(bold)Cycle detection$() — prevents diamond ↔ diamond_block loops$(li)$(bold)Agent loop breaker$() — if the AI calls the same tool 3+ times with identical arguments, it stops and tells you what’s missing$(br2)When crafting isn’t possible, the companion will tell you exactly what materials you need.

pages.title: Smelting
pages.text: The $(bold)smelt_items$() tool handles furnace automation:$(br2)$(li)Finds a nearby furnace (or auto-crafts + places one)$(li)Inserts items and fuel$(li)Waits for smelting to complete$(li)Collects the output$(li)Auto-gathers fuel (mines coal underground, or chops trees)$(li)Pulls fuel from tagged STORAGE chests$(br2)Smelting is also built into the crafting chain — if a recipe needs ingots, the companion will smelt raw ore automatically.$(br2)Say $(thing)"Smelt my raw iron"$() or just $(thing)"Make iron ingots"$().
